bio: Pierre Laurent is a neo-impressionist painter from Lyon, specializing in pointillist techniques. His work uses thousands of tiny dots of pure color to create luminous, vibrant compositions that explore light, color theory, and optical effects in the tradition of Seurat and Signac.

media.videoPost: Pointillist technique in my Lyon studio. Thousands of tiny dots create luminous compositions. Following in the footsteps of Seurat and Signac, exploring light and color theory through meticulous brushwork. Each dot is a decision, each decision creates harmony. #Pointillism #NeoImpressionism #LyonArtist
